meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of Sharon Adams for her 26 years of service and dedication to the City and Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the meeting held on May 16, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Samuell Grand Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize an alcohol permit to Alison Matis, to serve alcohol at the Juneteenth Unity Festival to be held at Samuell Grand.

agenda_items.title: Old City Park – Alcohol Permit
agenda_items.description: Authorize an alcohol permit to Progressive Hospital Management, to serve alcohol at the Summer Kick Off event at Old City Park.

agenda_items.title: Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition from A+ Charter Schools, Inc., of approximately 473,497 square feet of land for a proposed new park.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Belt Trail – Easements
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition of three easements from Fairhill School for the Cotton Belt Trail Project.

agenda_items.title: Bank of Texas Annual Trust Funds Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the annual trust funds by Rachael Berry.

agenda_items.title: Comprehensive Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the comprehensive plan by Ryan O’Connor.

agenda_items.title: Planning & Construction Update
agenda_items.description: Update on planning and construction by Christina Turner-Noteware.

agenda_items.title: Budget Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the budget by Rachael Berry.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Bond Program: Implementation Plan
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the implementation plan for the 2024 bond program.

financial_items.description: Estimated revenue from Juneteenth Unity Festival alcohol permit
Acquisition of land from A+ Charter Schools, Inc.
Acquisition of easements for Cotton Belt Trail Project
